content: Hi everyone, I created a wiki page on the User Decision Fulfillment proposal: https://github.com/cds-hooks/docs/wiki/User-Decision-Fulfillment. As discussed at the connectathon, please provide your feedback. (cc: @Isaac Vetter @Kevin Shekleton ).
What's your preferred method for getting feedback? I don't think GitHub wikis have a commenting mechanism (short of editing the page itself).
I think people were just going to modify the page directly. That said, we can either use this thread or start a google group thread.
